extendedInfo.description: Easy time tracking and timesheet generationRecord time against projects and tasks and bill your clients easily. Use the timer to record as you work or manually enter time at a later stage. Generate Excel or CSV reports and use the Dashboard to keep track of your time.ââ Features ââ- Timer function- Ad Free- Record time against client/project and optionally task- Dashboard provides analytics on your time recorded- Export time recorded to Excel/CSV file- Export time recorded to your Google Calendar- Set project rate and overtime rate for invoicing purposes- Apply Tax when generating reports- Reminder notifications when timer is running- Use GPS for location based time tracking, notification when near designated task location- Timeout for long running timer- View exported reports, easily share and delete files- Backup your data to XML using Google Drive or on phone's SD cardTags: Timesheet, Timetracker, Projects, Timer, Excel, Google Calendar, GPS Location, Personal Analytics, Invoicing

reviews.title: Best one I have found
reviews.comment: Dose overtime multiple pay ie field/ shop/driving  pay if differnt love it evan calculate the taxes off pay period within app
reviews.author: Joey Stearns

reviews.title: Very good app
reviews.comment: Very nice and intuitive app. I would only like to see \"Note\" tab for describing work time.
reviews.author: Netko Nepoznat

reviews.title: A few features short
reviews.comment: Hard to complain when it\'s free, but for me automatic backup of all recorded information is vital. Also there\'s a bug in restoring from a backup if that backed up data already exists, which makes me sceptical of the robustness of the backups. Otherwise it\'s a clean, simple interface, which is more than can be said of most time tracking apps.
reviews.author: Oliver Lade

reviews.title: Simple, easy to use, and does everything I need
reviews.comment: Reports are easy to make in any configuration I need.  Client, project and task set up was simple and straight forward.  Nice clean interface.  I am impressed.  Thank you, thank you for the new dashboard.  It is perfect. I now have absolutely everything I could ask for in this app to track my home business client hours and billing.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Useful but
reviews.comment: Would pay for a feature that allows to pick the client along with the task and whether or not to enable GPS for that particular tracking of that task at that time.
reviews.author: Douglas Burrell

reviews.title: Stop shutting down
reviews.comment: I would give this app a 5 star rating if it would stop saying unfortunately easy tempus has stopped, right after I try and make a client. other than that I would love it. fix that problem and I will fix my rating to a 5 star
reviews.author: Elizabeth Turner

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: it\'s great and does the job well, but in the settings, disabling time out and reminders is not working. even though I disable it, it still does the reminder alarm
reviews.author: Kamal Chandra

reviews.title: Needs a few tweaks
reviews.comment: A couple of bug fixes and interface tweaks will make this a nice free utility.  Bug fix needed: interface with Google calendar not working on my S3.  Interface tweaks: cumbersome linking tasks to clients to projects.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: John
reviews.comment: Timer and google calendar export are useful
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: great idea and great app
reviews.comment: great app but the reports crashed for me.
reviews.author: A Google User
